Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Archipelago

Class Archipelago

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Archipelago.Archipelago
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Archipelago extends Object implements Serializable
Class that models all the islands on the table. It contains a list of IslandGroup to model the merged IslandTiles.
See Also:

    Creates the Archipelago and creates 12 IslandGroups,

  • Method Details

    • initialStudentPlacement

      public void initialStudentPlacement(List<Student> students)
      Places students on the IslandTile at the start of the game. Places given students on each IslandTile skipping the one with MotherNature and its opposite
      Parameters:
      students - 10 random students, 2 of each color

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(IslandTile islandTileDestination, int moveCount) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Calls the motherNatureStrategy method to handle moving MotherNature
      Parameters:
      islandTileDestination - Island group selected by the user
      moveCount - Allowed island that MotherNature can move
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • moveMotherNature

      Parameters:
      islandTileDestinationID - Island group selected by the user
      moveCount - Allowed island that MotherNature can move
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      NoSuchElementException

    • resolveIslandGroup

      public void resolveIslandGroup(IslandGroup islandGroup, PlayerList players, ProfessorSet professorSet) throws GameOverException
      Resolves IslandGroup
      Parameters:
      islandGroup - IslandGroup to resolve
      players - players in play who could get ownership of the islandGroup
      professorSet - The set to manage professor ownership and calculate influence
      Throws:
      GameOverException

      Parameters:
      islandGroupIndex - IslandGroupID to resolve
      players - players in play who could get ownership of the islandGroup
      professorSet - The set to manage professor ownership and calculate influence
      Throws:
      GameOverException

    • conquerIslandGroup

      public boolean conquerIslandGroup(IslandGroup islandGroup, Player player)
      Conquers the IslandGroup, replacing (if existing) towers with those of team
      Parameters:
      islandGroup - The IslandGroup to conquer
      player - The tower holder of the team who conquers the IslandGroup

      public HashMap<Integer,Color> getStudentIDs()
      Returns all students contained in all islands with their color
      Returns:
      An HashMap with StudentID as key and Color as value

    • getIslandTilesStudentsIDs

      public HashMap<Integer,List<Integer>> getIslandTilesStudentsIDs()
      Searches all IslandTiles to find which students each contains
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing as Key the ID of the IslandTile, as object a list of StudentIDs

    • getIslandTilesIDs

      public HashMap<Integer,List<Integer>> getIslandTilesIDs()
      For each IslandGroup finds the IDs of its IslandTiles
      Returns:
      An HashMap with key the (current) index of the IslandGroup and a list of its IslandTiles IDs

    • getNumOfIslandGroups

      public int getNumOfIslandGroups()

      Returns:
      the number of IslandGroups

    • getIslandGroupID

      public int getIslandGroupID(int islandTileID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Given the ID of an IslandTile, returns the index of the IslandGroup which contains it
      Parameters:
      islandTileID - The ID of the IslandTile to check
      Returns:
      The ID of the IslandGroup
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If no IslandTile with given ID exists

    • getIslandGroupsOwner

      public HashMap<Integer,TowerColor> getIslandGroupsOwner()
      Returns the IslandGroups indexes along with the TowerColor of the Team who has towers. The color is null when no Team holds the IslandGroup
      Returns:
      an HashMap containing the indexes of the IslandGroup as key and the TowerColor as Key

    • getNoEntryTiles

      public HashMap<Integer,Integer> getNoEntryTiles()
      Returns the IslandGroups indexes along with the number of NoEntryTiles each contains
      Returns:
      The IslandGroups indexes along with the number of NoEntryTiles each contains
